name: River Guard
description:
By accident the major African rivers are contaminated and some fish turn into monsters (they eat other fish + humans). You are sent by your village elders on a mission deep into the rivers to eliminate the monster fish in order to protect the rivers and the people who live around them. Your goal is to kill as many infected fish and river creatures as possible, to clean the rivers. 

There are also healer fish to help you regain your health.
